mission.posting: Someone has uncovered some... information regarding hellSec and its motives that we wouldn't want out in the open. We want you to delete all trace of this evidence.

email.subject: In the Shadows
email.body:
Hey, This guy named Nick Smith has uncovered some information regarding our little faction and I want you to remove all evidence of it. Delete any file you find that has the name "hellSec" in the title, and BE THOROUGH. We don't want this information going out to the public just yet.
Watch out for proxies, too.
Good luck, -Z3r0

attachments.note: You may run in to proxies. To bypass them, you will need to set up shells on nodes you have admin access to using the command "shell"
